title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
For Task A, the response must correctly define a political concept.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a difference between the two political concepts.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain the impact of the political concept.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain the effect that the political concept can have on another political concept.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
